subject: Make cell selector bigger on mobile, default to 2x2 grid layout
body:
Cell grid is now 64px wide on mobile (was 48px) so it's more noticeable
and easier to tap. Default layout changed from fullbleed (1 cell) to
quad-grid (2x2, 4 cells) so the cell selector immediately shows multiple
cells, making the relationship between the grid and the canvas obvious.
